source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_00<tab>The Crystal Exarch is the very picture of resolve.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_00<tab>エクセドラ大広場の水晶公は、決戦の準備が整うのを待っているようだ。

source:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_01<tab>On your signal, the Exarch lifts the ward, and together you stride into the Crystal Tower to meet with Elidibus.

※In the event that you leave the instance, you may re-enter by speaking with the Crystarium sentry.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_01<tab>水晶公とともに、クリスタルタワーの中へと突入した。一度外に出た場合は、ドッサル大門の「案内役の衛兵」が、再度内部に案内してくれるようだ。

source:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_02<tab>As you wind your way up through the tower, your adversary's incessant summonings take an ever-heavier toll on your companion, eventually bringing him to his knees. His rapidly crystallizing body no longer able to keep up, the Exarch vows to hold the spectral warriors at bay while you go on alone─and so you do, hoping all the while that you will see him again.

Some time later, you gain the tower's uppermost level, where you come face-to-face with Elidibus at last. In defiance of his fading memories, the Ascian clings to his name and duty, and takes unto himself the power of yet more heroes to arise as the Warrior of Light incarnate. In this puissant form, he unleashes a burst of all-consuming radiance at you, only to look on agog as you emerge unscathed. In your hand shines the constellation crystal you received from Hythlodaeus, while around you an array of arcane rings stand ready to summon champions from beyond the rift to your aid. The odds thus evened, you steel yourself for the decisive battle with your oldest foe.

※The Seat of Sacrifice can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_02<tab>始皇帝の玉座にて、エリディブスと再会した。世界を救うために決して諦めない「ウォーリア・オブ・ライト」となった彼を討ち果たそう。

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_03<tab>The battle unfolds with neither side willing to yield an ilm, but it is ultimately you who delivers the final blow, bringing Elidibus to his knees.
target: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_03<tab>ウォーリア・オブ・ライトを倒した。塔を出て、クリスタリウムの街に戻ろう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_04<tab>Defiant even in defeat, Elidibus proclaims his own immortality, only for the Exarch to arrive and play his promised trump card. Harnessing the Crystal Tower's vast reservoir of energy, he strips the primal of his power and entraps his scattered essence. Before the Ascian fades into oblivion, however, you choose to restore his lost memories to him, granting him a semblance of peace at the last.

It is, by any measure, a historic victory, but one not without cost, for it soon becomes clear that the Exarch's exertions have taken a fatal toll. As what remains of his flesh turns into crystal, he begs one last favor of you: a journey together. Comforted by your answer, he entrusts to you his mind and memories before commencing his silent vigil...
target: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_04<tab>エリディブスを塔に封じ、水晶公の記憶と魂を託された。エクセドラ大広場の「リーン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_05<tab>Rejoining your other comrades in the Exedra, you learn from Ryne that all has returned to normal in Norvrandt. Yet something clearly weighs upon her mind...
target: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_SEQ_05<tab>リーンから、すべての脅威が去ったことを聞いた。ノルヴラントでの戦いも、いよいよ終わりのときを迎えたようだ。
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_TODO_00<tab>クリスタルタワー内へ向かう
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_TODO_01<tab>「ウォーリア・オブ・ライト」を討伐
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_TODO_02<tab>「ウォーリア・オブ・ライト」を討伐

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_100_000<tab>M-My <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>! Sincerest apologies, but the way to your room is blocked at the moment. In their rush to see the starshower, a number of residents lost their footing and fell down the stairs, you see... Our chirurgeons are presently attending to them, and we ask for your patience and understanding until such time as they can be moved.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS_100_000<tab>申し訳ございません……！
外の様子を見に行こうとして、階段で転倒なさった方がいて……
お部屋へのご案内は、少々お待ちください。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_MYSTERYVOICE_000_000<tab>You are ready, then? Very well. I shall lift the ward.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_MYSTERYVOICE_000_000<tab>準備は……よさそうだな。
よし、結界を解いて、クリスタルタワーの扉を開くとしよう。
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_A1_000_002<tab>今度こそ決着をつけてやる！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_A1_000_003<tab>You know, it wasn't so long ago that I watched you seal the place up.

TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_MYSTERYVOICE_000_004<tab>And finish it we shall. For no hero our foe could summon to his side shall ever compare to you! And...as for me...well, no ally you could summon to your side will ever try harder, that much I swear.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_MYSTERYVOICE_000_004<tab>ああ、私も精一杯、その背中を押すとしよう。
どれほどの英雄たちが相手でも、
あなたは決して、負けたりしない……！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_MYSTERYVOICE_000_005<tab>So come, my friend! Let's finish this─once and for all!
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_MYSTERYVOICE_000_006<tab>Hm? <var 1A 02 /var>Ah<var 1A 01 /var>, before I began my slumber, you mean? Ha! It seems rather longer to me. But yes, what strange symmetry.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_MYSTERYVOICE_000_006<tab>あのとき、って……
もしかして、オレが塔を封印したときのことか？

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_MYSTERYVOICE_000_007<tab>This time, I break the seal, and I have no intention of locking myself away again.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_MYSTERYVOICE_000_007<tab>言われてみれば、確かに正反対だな……。
今度はあんたを連れて、塔を開こうとしてるんだから。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_MYSTERYVOICE_000_008<tab>Nay, together we will enter, and together we will leave─in triumph. So come, my friend. Let us be about it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_MYSTERYVOICE_000_008<tab>なに、あのときみたいに閉じてそのままってことはないさ。
オレたちは勝って、また扉を開けて出てくるんだ。
……さあ、行こう！

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_GUIDESOLDIER03643_000_010<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Sir)) /var>! Will you be entering the tower?
target: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_GUIDESOLDIER03643_000_010<tab>クリスタルタワーの中に入られますか……！？
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_Q2_000_0011<tab>「始皇帝の玉座」へ移動しますか？

source:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>At such moments, it is hard to know what to say...
...Are you all right, my friend?
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>平気かい……？
いろいろなことがあったのだろうけど……
君の無事だって、とても大事なことだよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>You did well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─you and the Exarch...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>おつかれさま。
あなたも、水晶公も……本当に。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_THANCRED_000_030<tab>Shortly after you left, we observed that our enemy's ranks were no longer being replenished─presumably when your absence was noted. So we polished them off and came as quickly as we could.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_THANCRED_000_030<tab>途中でお前がいないことに感づいたのか、
俺たちの方に召喚される幻体が減ってな……
早々に決着をつけて、こっちに来たんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_THANCRED_000_031<tab>...Which is to say, not quickly enough. But then you had the Exarch for company, didn't you, and you could ask for no better than that.
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_URIANGER_000_035<tab>Ere we descended from the throne room, I did chance upon an object which, if I have the right of it, did once─
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_URIANGER_000_035<tab>実は、始皇帝の玉座から降りてくる際に、
気になるものを見つけたのです。
これを、あなたに……

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_URIANGER_000_036<tab>...Hm. M-Mine apologies. Mayhap now is not an appropriate time. Let us speak of it later.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_URIANGER_000_036<tab>いえ、やはり、もう少しあとにいたしましょう……。
私自身も、今の状況を受け入れるのに、
しばしの時間をいただきたく……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_YSHTOLA_000_040<tab>Sometimes, I wish that I too had been gifted with the Echo. Then I might see what you have seen and glimpse into your heart without the need for words.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_YSHTOLA_000_040<tab>……こんなとき、私にも超える力があればいいのにと思うわ。
あなたに語らせずとも、過去を視てわかってあげられたら、
どんなにいいことか……とね。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_RYNE_000_050<tab>...Hm? Am I all right? I should be the one asking you...
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_RYNE_000_050<tab>あ……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……。
もう、大丈夫でしょうか……その……怪我とかも……。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_RYNE_000_051<tab>But yes, I'm fine, thank you. We all are.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_RYNE_000_051<tab>こちらは、全員無事です。
手分けして確認してきましたが、
街の方にも、被害は出ていませんでした。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_RYNE_000_052<tab>The people are fine, the city's fine, and the starshowers have stopped.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_RYNE_000_052<tab>空も、このとおり……
ほかの地域でも、流星雨の幻影は消えていると思います。

source: TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_RYNE_000_053<tab>It's almost as if we'd gone back to the peaceful days that followed the night's return. Almost.
target:
TEXT_LUCKMI108_03778_RYNE_000_053<tab>まるで……何もかも、闇を取り戻した直後の、
穏やかだった日々に戻ったみたいな……。
でも……。
